concept.title: AF PGI 5316.505 Ordering

conbody.p: (b)(1) Acquisition teams are encouraged to utilize the AFMC Guiding Principles for Fair Opportunity Selection . These guiding principles help acquisition teams understand the difference between FAR 16.505 fair opportunity competitions and FAR 15.3 source selections and to provide possible fair opportunity competition ordering strategies.
